title: Senior Full Stack Developer
description: Join our engineering team building software for electric aircraft. You'll work on React frontends, Node.js backends, and real-time data systems. Experience with aviation or IoT is a plus.

title: Frontend Engineer
description: Build automotive retail platforms used by thousands of dealerships. Modern React stack with GraphQL. Remote-friendly for VT residents.

title: AI/ML Engineer - Vibe Coding
description: Help developers build with AI. You'll create tools and workflows that leverage Claude, GPT, and other LLMs. Must be comfortable with prompt engineering and AI-assisted development.

title: Game Developer - Phaser/HTML5
description: Create engaging browser-based games using Phaser 3. We ship weekly, iterate fast, and value creativity. Portfolio of game projects required.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Early-stage startup building tools for sustainable agriculture. Small team, big impact. Equity included.

title: Data Visualization Engineer
description: Build stunning interactive visualizations using D3.js and modern web tech. You'll work with large datasets and create dashboards that tell stories.

title: Node.js Backend Developer
description: Build secure, scalable APIs for financial applications. Experience with payment systems, compliance, and high-availability systems preferred.

title: GIS Developer
description: Work on geospatial applications for environmental monitoring. Experience with Leaflet, MapBox, or similar required. Government contracts.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Manage Kubernetes clusters, CI/CD pipelines, and infrastructure as code. We're a platform team supporting 50+ developers.

title: React Native Developer
description: Build cross-platform mobile apps for iOS and Android. We value clean code, testing, and user experience.
